title: Educational Computational Chemistry (ECC) Teacher Training: Technology-Supported Instructional Design-Based E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry theories and experimental methods, basic computer literacy
context.additional_context: Teacher competency enhancement program addressing post-COVID-19 demand for technology-supported education

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of educational computational chemistry (ECC)—such as quantum chemistry and molecular modeling—to actual lesson design
Learners can create chemistry education content using interactive digital tools (e.g., molecular simulation software)
Learners can execute integrated lesson design combining technology, pedagogy, and science knowledge based on the TPACK framework
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
